attributes.action: Remove Pakistan of the Red List
attributes.additional_details: Many of us cannot afford to get stuck here as we have jobs and livelihoods to pay for as well sending our children to school. There will be a big impact on every British national that is here at the moment. We all know it’s expensive too quarantine in a hotel and in some cases unaffordable for us . We all know how important it is for us to get back so we don’t disturb the education of our children and our jobs as well. Many of us could potentially lose our jobs, kids potentially kicked out.
attributes.background: Let’s work together to remove Pakistan of the red list as there are many British nationals here that have come here to visit their loved ones or ill parents. With Pakistan due to come on the list on Friday 9th there are going to be a lot of British nationals that are going to be stranded.
